summary_text: Analysis of campaign performance from 2025-01-01 to 2025-03-31, focusing on ROAS, CTR, spend, creative, and audience performance.

insights.title: Potential ROAS decline in late March
insights.description: ROAS shows a declining trend towards the end of March.  Several days show ROAS values significantly below the overall ROAS.

insights.title: Underperforming Video Creatives
insights.description: Several video creatives are significantly underperforming compared to other creative types, as indicated by their low ROAS values.

creative_issues.creative_message: Breathable modal that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.
Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.
Doctors recommend breathable bamboo — meet our men inner vests.
Doctors recommend breathable cotton — meet our men briefs.

insights.title: Creative Fatigue in Long-Running Campaigns
insights.description: Creatives running for extended periods (20+ days) show signs of fatigue. Their ROAS may decrease over time, suggesting a need for creative refreshes.

insights.title: CTR Fluctuations Indicate Potential Audience Saturation
insights.description: Daily CTR values fluctuate, suggesting potential saturation within targeted audiences or a need to refine audience targeting strategies.
